results.text: You were the top of your class and it shows. You have advantage on your next Arcana check.
You remember reading about this creature and its peculiar biology in a book. You identify one of the target creature’s damage resistances or immunities (if it has any).
You suddenly recall some relevant knowledge from your studies. You gain an expertise die to an Arcana skill specialty relevant to the situation for the next 24 hours.

You’ve spent many an hour poring over tomes related to the planes beyond your own. You accurately determine one special trait of a plane mentioned, such as time distortion, unusual weather patterns, or any other characteristic that would impact travel.
The proverbial lightbulb goes off in your head. You recall or discover a piece of Key Knowledge related to the target.

You’re in sync with the arcane energies around you, granting you higher awareness of them. For the next minute you are under the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kaye34nheyrit487]{Detect Magic} spell.
